# anz-schedule-brain

> This is a monetized, verified ground-truth MCP for ANZ scheduling.
> Supports x402 payments and x-api-key bearer authentication.
> Compatible with Nevermined proxying.

## What this server does

anz-schedule-brain is a FastMCP server that provides 100% verified 2026 public
holiday and school term data for New Zealand and every Australian state and
territory (VIC, NSW, QLD, WA, SA, TAS, NT, ACT).

## Tools

- **is_public_holiday(date, region)** — Returns whether a date is a public
  holiday, the holiday name and type, and the full regional holiday list.

- **get_school_term(date, region)** — Returns whether a date falls inside a
  school term, which week, how many school days remain, and the full term schedule.

- **get_next_business_day(date, region)** — Returns the next Monday–Friday that
  is not a public holiday, with a list of any holidays skipped.

## Regions supported

NZ, VIC, NSW, QLD, WA, SA, TAS, NT, ACT

## Authentication

Pass your API key as an HTTP header: `x-api-key: <your-key>`

## Endpoint (SSE)

https://anz-schedule-brain-production.up.railway.app/sse

## Source

https://github.com/TyrenTemp/anz-schedule-brain
